name: NOMAD Apps
description:
NOMAD (Naively Optimistic Mobile App Developers, LLC) was co-founded by Mike Reiners, a high school math teacher, and Reuben Simonson, a former console game developer whose credits include Pandemonium!, a platinum best-selling title for PlayStation.
What started as a casual conversation between the two about their passion for game development and educational software quickly led to the formation of a mobile app development group.NOMAD soon attracted a number of experienced coders and aspiring young programmers who support the company’s vision and innovative app concepts, creating a group of passionate and dedicated developers.
